concepts.title: Addition and Substraction of Algebric Expressions
concepts.text:
Rule: Apply operations on Coefficients of Like Terms
Example:  
$$3x^{3} + 4x+ 2x^{2}+17x-3x^{2}-14x^{3}$$
Arranging like terms
$$3x^{3}-14x^{3} + 4x+17x+ 2x^{2}-3x^{2}$$
Now adding and subtracting
$$-11x^{3}+21x-x^{2}$$

concepts.title: Division of Monomial by a Monomial
concepts.text:
Divide: $$25y^{4}$$ by $$5 y^{3}$$
Divide Numerical Coefficient by Numerical Coefficient and Variable by Variable, so we get 
$$\dfrac{25}{5}. \dfrac{y^{4}}{y^{3}}$$
$$=5.y^{4-3} $$
$$=5y$$

concepts.title: Division of Polynomial by a Monomial
concepts.text:
Divide $$6x^{4}-8x^{3}+12x-4$$ by $$2x^{2}$$
Split the Terms in Numerator by Dividing each Terms in Numerator by Denominator
$$\dfrac{6x^{4}}{2x^{2}} - \dfrac{8x^{3}}{2x^{2}}+ \dfrac{12x}{2x^{2}}-\dfrac{4}{2x^{2}}$$
Simplify
$$3x^{2}-4x+\dfrac{6}{x}-\dfrac{2}{x^{2}}$$

concepts.title: Division of Polynomial by a Polynomial
